name: Motor Transport Labor Relations, Inc. v. Team Drivers Local No. 470, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Motor Transport Labor Relations, Inc. v. Team Drivers Local No. 470

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Mtjsmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno and Mr. Justice Cohen dissent.
parties: Motor Transport Labor Relations, Inc. v. Team Drivers Local No. 470, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This is also an appeal from a decree granting a preliminary injunction which must be affirmed for the same reasons as given in the case of Riverside Borough School District v. International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, etc., 389 Pa. 637.
Decree affirmed at appellants’ costs.
Mr. Justice Musmanno and Mr. Justice Cohen dissent.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Motor Transport Labor Relations, Inc. v. Team Drivers Local No. 470, Appellant.
July 1, 1957:
Argued June 27, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Mtjsmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Edward Davis, for appellants.
G. Brewster Rhoads, for appellees.
